snippet.title: Live Coding: Flask & OAuth2 (Login with Discord)
snippet.description:
Code at https://github.com/DevDungeon/OAuth2-Login-Python-Flask-Example

Continuing stream from yesterday, we will be improving the stable code we left off with at https://github.com/DevDungeon/DjangoAuthExample and finishing some todo items and integrating a social authentication provider like Discord, GitHub, Google, Facebook, Twitter, etc. In this example we will use Discord as the social authentication provider.

GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
Support the stream: https://streamlabs.com/devdungeon
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/JWsSHJC
Get $100 credit for signing up to Digital Ocean: https://m.do.co/c/5ccd98162d85 
Buy my book: Security with Go https://www.packtpub.com/networking-and-servers/security-go
Website: https://www.devdungeon.com
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/DevDungeon
